name: Forest Saver
overview: A ranger has to do a lot of work to preserve the forest. He has to take care of the loggers, the industries that want to pollute the lakes, and the arsonists who wants space for their pastures. Use the joystick in port 2 to walk around and scare the villains before they can finish cutting off a tree, pollute the water, or burn bushes. This game was developed by Intoinside and released into the public domain on February 6, 2022.
